poperty.sql: select f.file_name,f.file_id,f.include_position,fp.target_page,f.file_path, f.file_type, f.ctime,p.page_template from file_page_relation fp left join page p on fp.target_page=p.page_id left join file f on fp.resource_file=f.file_id where 9=9

poperty.explain: modular查询，通过模块id查询内容

poperty.sql: select uid,utime,user_name,status,age,ctime,mobile from users where uid=$[uid] and utime=$[utime] and user_name='$[user_name]' and status=$[status] and age=$[age] and ctime=$[ctime] and mobile='$[mobile]'
delete from file_page_relation where resource_file=$[file_id] and target_page in (select page_type_code as target_page from page_type)
select `config_file_id`,`config_file_path`,`config_file_name`,`config_file_desc`,`config_file_type`,`ctime`,`cuser` from config_files where 9=9 and status=1
select `page_id`,`page_name`,`page_url` from page where 9=9 and status=1
select pt.page_type_id,pt.page_type_name, pt.page_type_code from page_type pt where 9=9
select * from file where status=1 and 9=9
select * from users usr where usr.status=$[status] and $[mySelf] and 9=9
update page set status=2 where page_id=$[page_id]
select p.`page_id`,p.`page_url`,p.`page_type`,pt.`page_type_code`,pt.`page_type_name` from page p left join page_type pt on pt.page_type_id=p.page_type where 9=9
select * from modular where status=1 and 9=9

select `page_id`,`page_id` as id,`page_name`,`page_target`,`parent_id`,`parent_id` as _parentId,`page_template`,`page_url`,`page_level`,`description`,`ctime`,`cuser`,`page_display`,`page_breadcrumb`,`page_order`,`page_type` from page where page_id=248 or parent_id=248 and 9=9

select f.file_name,f.file_id,fp.target_page,f.file_path, f.file_type, f.ctime,p.page_template from file_page_relation fp left join page p on fp.target_page=p.page_id left join file f on fp.resource_file=f.file_id where 9=9
select * from modular where status=1 and 9=9

select a.ad_space_id, b.ad_schedule_id,b.ad_schedule_id as schedule_id,ad_schedule_num,b.ad_schedule_name, c.ad_source_resource,c.ad_source_url,c.ad_source_imgpath,c.ad_source_title,c.ad_source_description, c.ad_source_id,c.ad_source_width,c.ad_source_high,c.ad_source_margin_top,c.ad_source_margin_left,c.p_ad_source_id from ad_space a join ad_schedule b on a.ad_space_id=b.ad_space_id left join ad_source c on b.ad_source_id=c.ad_source_id where 9=9 order by b.ad_schedule_num,b.ad_schedule_priority

select m.`modular_id`,m.`modular_type`,m.`modular_func`,m.`status`, mt.`modular_path`, mt.page_type_id from modular m left join modular_type mt on m.modular_type=mt.modular_type_id left join page_type pt on mt.page_type_id=pt.page_type_id where 9=9
select modular_id,modular_name,modular_func from modular where 9=9 and status=1

select `page_id`,`page_id` as id,`page_name`,`page_target`,`parent_id`,`parent_id` as _parentId,`page_url`,`page_level`, page_display,page_breadcrumb,page_order,description,page_type from page where 9=9

update web_publish set message=concat('[','$[uname]',' ',NOW(),']','$[message]'),log_message=concat('[','$[uname]',' ',NOW(),']','$[log_message]'),status='$[status]',ctime=now(),cuser=$[uid] where web_publish_id='$[web_publish_id]'
select `modular_id`,`modular_name`,`modular_type`,`modular_func`,`status`,`modular_edit_status` from modular where modular_func in ($[modular_func]) and status=1
select * from modular_type where status=1 and 9=9

select dg,phone,price,store,status,product_name,pid,ctime from products where pid=$[pid] and dg=$[dg] and phone='$[phone]' and price=$[price] and store=$[store] and status=$[status] and product_name='$[product_name]' and ctime=$[ctime]
select mt.`modular_path`,mt.`page_type_id`,pt.`page_type_code` from modular_type mt left join page_type pt on pt.page_type_id=mt.page_type_id where 9=9
delete from file_page_relation where resource_file=$[file_id] and target_page not in(select page_type_code as target_page from page_type)

select asrr.ad_schedule_id , asrr.rule_param,asrr.ad_schedule_id, ar.rule_object from ad_schedule_rule_raltion asrr left join ad_rule ar on asrr.ad_rule_id=ar.ad_rule_id where 9=9 and ar.status=1 and asrr.status=1
select * from modular_type where status=1 and 9=9
select `config_file_id`,`config_file_path`,`config_file_content`,`config_file_type` from config_files where 9=9 and status=1
select uid,plog_id,product_name,action,pid,ctime from products_log where plog_id=$[plog_id] and uid=$[uid] and product_name='$[product_name]' and action='$[action]' and pid=$[pid] and ctime=$[ctime]
select * from page where status=1 and 9=9

select DISTINCT `file_id`,`file_name`,`file_path`,`include_position`,`file_type`,f.`target_page`,`file_order`,`description`,`isCompress`,f.`status`,f.`ctime`,f.`cuser` from file f left join file_page_relation fp on f.file_id=fp.resource_file where 9=9 and f.status=1
update file set `file_content`='$[file_content]', ctime=NOW(), cuser=$[uid] where file_id=$[file_id]
select * from page where status=1 and 9=9
select page_id,page_name,page_url,ctime,cuser,page_type,page_order from page where 9=9 and status=1 order by ctime desc
select `file_id`,`file_name`,`file_path`,`file_type`,`target_page`,`file_order`,`description`,`isCompress`,`status`,`ctime`,`cuser` from file where 9=9 and status=1
select id from qd_s_menu where sid regexp '$[sid]' and id=$[menu_id];
select `resource_file`,`target_page`,`target_page` as p_id from file_page_relation where 9=9
select m.`modular_id`,m.`modular_content`,m.`modular_type`, mt.`modular_path` from modular m left join modular_type mt on m.modular_type=mt.modular_type_id where 9=9
update page set `page_content`='$[page_content]' ,ctime=NOW(), cuser=$[uid] where page_id=$[page_id]
select file_id,file_name,file_path from file where 9=9 and status=1

update web_publish set message=concat('[','$[uname]',' ',NOW(),']','$[message]'),log_message=concat('[','$[uname]',' ',NOW(),']','$[log_message]'),status='$[status]',checktime=now(),checkuser=$[uid] where web_publish_id='$[web_publish_id]'

select `page_id`,`page_id` as id,`page_name`,`page_target`,`parent_id`,`parent_id` as _parentId,`page_template`,`page_url`,`page_level`,`description`,`ctime`,`cuser`,`page_display`,`page_breadcrumb`,`page_order`,`page_type` from page where 9=9
select * from resource_logs where 9=9 order by ctime desc

select m.`modular_id`,m.`modular_name`,m.`modular_type`,m.`modular_func`,m.`description`,m.`status`,m.`modular_description`,m.`page_type`,mt.`modular_type_name`,m.`modular_image`,m.`ctime`,m.`cuser` , m.`modular_edit_status`,m.`modular_editor` from modular m left join modular_type mt on m.modular_type=mt.modular_type_id where 9=9 order by m.`ctime` desc
select * from file where status=1 and 9=9
select f.file_path,f.target_page, f.file_type, f.ctime,p.page_template from file f left join page p on f.target_page=p.page_id where 9=9
update modular set `modular_content`='$[modular_content]',`status`=$[status], ctime=NOW(), cuser=$[uid] where modular_id=$[modular_id]
select a.product_name,a.uid,a.price,b.action from products a,products_log b on a.pid=b.pid and 9=9
select file_id,file_name,file_path,file_type from file where 9=9 and status=1
